snippet.title: Midnight lights - Announcement Trailer - (PS1 Style Horror Game)
snippet.description:
A small project I have been developing in my free time. I hope to continue working on it and release a playable version soon. When I have fully developed the project you will be able to find it here, along with some other games that I have created on Itch:
 https://niffbluegriff.itch.io/

If you are interested in some more of my projects. You can visit my portfolio along with other socials to view my work.
Artstation: https://www.artstation.com/cbnull 
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/niffbluegriff 
Twitter: https://twitter.com/NiffBlueGriff
Itch: https://niffbluegriff.itch.io/

Thanks for watching :)
